title: Wolverine: Official Index to the Marvel Universe GN-TPB (Trade Paperback)
description: Get the complete history of the X-Men’s favorite berserker mutant, from his earliest solo miniseries all the way to the present day! This book comes packed with synopses of all four volumes of WOLVERINE, plus WOLVERINE: WEAPON X, dozens of one-shots and more — introducing you to the characters, teams, places and equipment that appeared within; and providing vital information about all things Wolverine! Collecting the Wolverine material from WOLVERINE, PUNISHER & GHOST RIDER: OFFICIAL INDEX TO THE MARVEL UNIVERSE #1-8.

series.name: Wolverine: Official Index to the Marvel Universe GN-TPB (2011 - Present)
